skills.name: Tempting Dream
skills.description: Attacks the enemy target to absorb the Attack Bar by 15% with a 30% chance and puts the enemy to sleep for 1 turn with a 10% chance. The damage increases accordingly to your Attack Speed.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Sleep
skill_effect.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage

skills.name: Healing Music
skills.description: Recovers the HP of all allies by 20% each, and grants immunity for 1 turn.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Immunity
skill_effect.description: Monster is immune to all negative status effects

skills.name: Salvation Song (Passive)
skills.description: Offsets the incoming damage that may cause your ally to die and instantly gains another turn. [Automatic Effect]
skills.level_progress_description:
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Decrease Damage
skill_effect.description: Decreases damage received by a certain amount
